util

Class PropertiesReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.PropertiesReader

  • public class PropertiesReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for reading various data types from property files

                   throws java.lang.Exception

        Returns:
        the retrieved int value
        Throws:

      • readObjectParam

        public static java.lang.Object readObjectParam(java.util.Properties properties,
                                               java.lang.String key)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads String value from properties that represents the name of the class (e.g. weka.classifiers.bayes.NaiveBayes) and creates a class instance using the default constructor
        Parameters:
        properties - The given properties
        key - key for the value to be retrieved
        Returns:
        instance of the class as Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the key is missing

                                                                   java.lang.String key)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads array of quoted String values divided by blank spaces (e.g. "str1" "str2" "str3")
        Parameters:
        properties - The given properties
        key - key for the value to be retrieved
        Returns:
        list of String values
        Throws:

      • readIntArrayParam

        public static int[] readIntArrayParam(java.util.Properties properties,
                                      java.lang.String key)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads array of int values divided by blank spaces (e.g. 1 2 3)
        Parameters:
        properties - The given properties
        key - key for the value to be retrieved
        Returns:
        array of int values
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the key is missing or the value is not array of integers
